issue.title: Default value of parameter theta of polar should be dependent

discussion.p: Parameter theta of polar has the type of the template parameter. Therefore, it needs to change the default initial value to T(). The change of the declaration of this function in is accompanied by this change.

blockquote.pre: template<class T> complex<T> polar(const T& rho, const T& theta = 0T());

discussion.note: 2017-06-27 Moved to Tentatively Ready after 7 positive votes on c++std-lib.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4659.

blockquote.pre: template<class T> complex<T> polar(const T&, const T& = 0T());
template<class T> complex<T> polar(const T& rho, const T& theta = 0T());
